ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:59:38 [Issue ID 4000-40052] urn:comicvine:4000-40052 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 11:50:43. [Issue ID 56140]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Some people would have to believe that there are no second chances in life - one chance, one shot is all you get. I disagree.
I think that the number of opportunities available to each of us are limited only by our expectations. In Link Two of CHAINS of CHAOS, our heroes dramatically reassess the possibilities open to them as they discover the existence of multiple versions of reality. The ever-renewing quality of love fires a revolution, gives birth to new hope and reverses daunting odds.
Okay, so you say it's only a comic book. I say, why choose to limit the possibilities of wonder in your life? Believe in that second chance, and when you see it - go for it.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/chains-of-chaos-2-link-2/4000-40052/
ComicInfo.Teams: The Cult of Chaos,Reptilian Shock Troops,Danse Macabre
ComicInfo.Title: Chains of Chaos: Link Two
